Name: Maximize Sprint Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Bug Count
Description: Reduce the number of unresolved bugs at sprint end

Name: Minimize Sprint Overrun
Description: Keep sprint actual duration within planned timeframe

Name: Maximize Feature Throughput
Description: Increase number of features released per release

Name: Minimize Cycle Time
Description: Reduce average time from story creation to deployment

Name: Minimize Context Switches
Description: Limit the number of task reassignments per sprint

Name: Maximize Backlog Health
Description: Keep product backlog well-groomed and prioritized

Name: Minimize Release Defects
Description: Reduce number of defects found post-release

Name: Maximize Roadmap Adherence
Description: Stay on track with planned milestones
